Odeinoichus,"2016-07-31T22:34:35.74Z","Preparing to Go on a Adventure!","

Set #30398 Adventure Camp Bridge: One of the free giveaways from LEGO Friends at LEGO S&H this year, the Adventure Camp Bridge is a nice little polybag that adds to the Adventure Camp sub-theme, it’s also in my opinion one of the best models they’ve given us so far in a Polybag and here’s why.

column2: Bridge Model is designed quite nicely with a good use of clips and bars to connect everything together, small size of model also captures a cute look very nicely.
Includes printed map tile piece and a small frog pond additional build that looks very fun.
Olivia Mini-Doll included features cargo pants in dark blue and sleeveless dark rose top. Also has camera and satchel accessory pieces.
Difficult to find if you missed it during the giveaway.
Scale of bridge can only accommodate the one Mini-Doll at a given time.
Model easily falls apart from the base, single large plate should have been used to strengthen the base of the model.

column1: This is a great Friends Polybag, the model is super fun and offers up some great play opportunities, especially when added to the larger Adventure Camp sets. It’s also got a great parts-per-price ratio considering it was free at the time. Recommended.

,TRUE,3,3,3,3,3 KingAlanI","2018-03-04T18:29:56.18Z","Nice little complement to its theme","

This set's aesthetic fits nicely with the bigger Adventure Camp sets, particularly 41121 Rafting and the water aspect of 41122 Tree House.

The frog on a rock is a nice change of pace from those on lilypads. Either way, it's appropriate for the water setting; Friends sets often have animals that don't fit the set's topic, like the hedgehog in 41120 Adventure Camp Archery. I also liked the new backpack piece.

It would be easy to combine multiple copies if you got them cheap, which I didn't. I missed it as a promo, and later saw some at the LEGO Store for $5. Usually polybags start out around $4 and can be found discounted. I was still glad to get a few towards the then-current promo and to complete my collection of the theme.
